summary.span: Provides a specialized that is optimized for loading images using Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).

span.span: Provides a specialized that is optimized for loading images using Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要目的是支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法并引入了其他属性对加载的位图不由定义。 primarily exists to support [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax and introduces additional properties for bitmap loading that are not defined by . 实现接口来优化对多个属性的初始化。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 只能在对象初始化过程中进行属性更改。Property changes can only occur during object initialization. 调用发出信号的初始化已开始和发出信号的初始化已完成。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用创建的对象自动初始化构造函数和属性更改将被忽略。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和代码。The following code examples demonstrate how to use a in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#SimpleXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml#simplexaml2)] [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#SimpleXAML2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml#simplexaml2)] [!code-csharp[ImageElementExample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml.cs#simplecsharp1)] [!code-vb[ImageElementExample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml.vb#simplecsharp1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.

span.span: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.

value.span: 将图像解码为的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果还，则忽略位图的长宽比。If is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored. 如果未设置，纵横比保持不变。If is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]编解码器以本机方式将图像解码到指定的大小; 其他编解码器解码以其原始大小的图像，并将图像缩放为所需的大小。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置使用代码的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. [!code-csharp[BitmapImageProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapImageProps/CSharp/BitmapImageProps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BitmapImageProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapImageProps/VB/BitmapImageProps.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放后执行旋转。Rotation is performed after scaling. 这意味着，具有图像的即为 10，和的 5 将导致映像具有 5 的宽度和高度为 10。This means that an image that has a of , a of 10, and of 5 will result in an image that has a width of 5 and a height of 10. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用旋转图像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和代码。The following code example demonstrates how to rotate an image by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#TransformedXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/TransformedImageExample.xaml#transformedxaml2)] [!code-csharp[ImageElementExample#TransformedCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/TransformedImageExample.xaml.cs#transformedcsharp1)] [!code-vb[ImageElementExample#TransformedCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/TransformedImageExample.xaml.vb#transformedcsharp1)]
